wikipedia_page.main: Connor Charles Smith (born 14 October 1996) is an English semi-professional footballer who plays as a winger for Northern Premier League Division One East club Frickley Athletic. He has played for Hartlepool United, Whitby Town, Spennymoor Town and York City.
